data.message: Facebook, your saying Facebook is free, but that does not talk about the rest of the " hoax". It talks about Facebook taking pictures and messages and even delete ones for their own use. Yes Facebook might be free. But what we post on here or delete we do not want anywhere else. Well at least not mine with my permission.  Sum this one up for me please.

replies.message: You're in control of what you share, Matthew.  You can learn more here: http://on.fb.me/Privacy-Basics-Posts -Liz
Once you post on here anybody can copy paste like share and screenshot. If you don't want any of that don't post it. Its social media nothing is truly private if it's put on the internet.
That's why I am selective on photography I post.
